title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Instructional Design for Acquiring Portuguese Gender System Mastery

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can classify the gender (masculine/feminine) of Portuguese nouns with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply gender agreement rules for adjectives, articles, and pronouns in three or more grammatical structures (e.g., determiner + noun + adjective).
Learners can demonstrate mastery of gender systems in sentences containing specialized terminology from medical, legal, or technical fields with over 70% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
